title: Riot please answer
body: Can someone from riot please inform me and the rest of the community as to why the New client was given(forced) to the public when it still has so many issues? It's been out for a few weeks now and i still hear of dc issues, black screen when going into games, people not reciving loot box rewards, People not recieving mastery tokens when the get s or s+ and Most of all So many people with Mid to high end pc's getting fps drops! I personally can't see or understand how this is ready? I've searched all over the net for an answer and no one seems to have one and riot seems to pretty hush hush about it.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
